name: Idea Spark
description: Idea Spark Notion TemplateThe ultimate resource for brainstorming and idea generation.This Interactive template with scientifically proven exercises will help you generate new and innovative ideas for any project or problem you're working on. With prompts and exercises like freewriting, word association, and the "What if?" game, you'll never run out of ideas. Plus, our additional resources include articles and videos to help you learn more about creativity and idea-generation techniques. A set o
features: A set of interactive templates and exercises that are based on proven techniques for brainstorming and idea generation; The ability to customize the templates and exercises to fit their specific needs and preferences; Access to additional resources, such as articles and videos, that can help users learn more about creativity and idea-generation techniques; The ability to collaborate with others on templates and exercises and share ideas in real-time; The ability to import templates and exercises into other tools to make it easier to incorporate ideas into workflows
